metadata.name: 1, Equanimity Abodes
metadata.description:
“With equanimity, we learn that traveling the bumpy roads can sometimes offer more to our journey than simply sticking to the smooth highways.”  
― John Bruna  
____________________________________________________________  
The second soft, utopian colony on ETH is named after the fourth abode of the Buddha, i.e. equanimity. Equanimity is a state of calm and stability that enables us to live with an open heart, unconditionally; detached while embracing both the good and bad that permeates our physical life experience. Equanimity Abodes aim to help residents embody this state with ease.  
____________________________________________________________  
AI-assisted architectural art
